wikipedia.title: The Image (film)
wikipedia.summary: The Image is a 1975 American adult drama that was re-released in an edited version in 1976.

wikipedia.title: The Opening of Misty Beethoven
wikipedia.summary: The Opening of Misty Beethoven is an American hardcore pornography film released in 1976.

wikipedia.title: The Tale of Tiffany Lust
wikipedia.summary: The Tale of Tiffany Lust, also known as Body Lust, is a classic American adult erotic film released in 1979.

wikipedia.title: The Lickerish Quartet
wikipedia.summary: The Lickerish Quartet (original UK title: Erotic Quartet) is a 1970 drama film produced and directed by Radley Metzger.

wikipedia.title: Score (film)
wikipedia.summary: Score is an American adult film film directed by Radley Metzger that was one of the first films to explore bisexual relationships.

wikipedia.title: Barbara Broadcast
wikipedia.summary: Barbara Broadcast is a classic American adult film released in 1977. The film was directed by Radley Metzger (as "Henry Paris") and filmed in elaborate locations in New York City.

wikipedia.title: Maraschino Cherry (1978 film)
wikipedia.summary: Maraschino Cherry is a classic American adult erotic film released in 1978. The film was directed by Radley Metzger (as "Henry Paris") and filmed in several elaborate locations in New York City.

wikipedia.title: The Private Afternoons of Pamela Mann
wikipedia.summary: The Private Afternoons of Pamela Mann was a 1974 American adult film starring Barbara Bourbon and directed by Radley Metzger (under his nom de porn "Henry Paris") that is considered one of the classics of the Golden Age of Porn.

wikipedia.title: Naked Came The Stranger (1975 film)
wikipedia.summary: Naked Came The Stranger is a classic American adult erotic film released in 1975. The film was directed by Radley Metzger (as "Henry Paris") and filmed in several elaborate locations in New York City.

wikipedia.title: Radley Metzger
wikipedia.summary: Radley Metzger (also known as Radley Henry Metzger and by the pseudonyms, "Henry Paris" and "Jake Barnes" – born January 21, 1929) is an American filmmaker and film distributor most noted for popular adult erotic films, including I, a Woman (1966), Camille
